nodes.text: The Toong'L system was a star system located within the Jubilar sector in the Outer Rim region of the galaxy which contained the planet of Toong'L.

In 22 BBY, the system left the Galactic Republic and was issued a new currency by the InterGalactic Banking Clan. The exchange rate translated as one Republic Credit able to buy 15 million King Kikipi credits.
